meanings.definition: The process of making someone or something more sensitive.
meanings.sent1: The sensitizations of the skin can cause reactions to certain substances.
meanings.sent2: After the sensitizations, she could feel even the slightest touch.
meanings.sent3: The sensitizations of the cat to catnip always lead to hilarious antics.
meanings.sent4: His sensitizations to criticism were like open wounds, easily hurt.
meanings.sent5: The sensitizations of the nerves were so intense that even a gentle breeze felt like a storm.

meanings.sent1: Her sensitizations to the cold made her shiver uncontrollably.
meanings.sent2: The sensitizations of his emotions made him more empathetic towards others.
meanings.sent3: The sensitizations of the alarm system caused it to go off at the slightest movement.
meanings.sent4: In the sensitizations of love, every gesture felt magnified and special.
meanings.sent5: The sensitizations of the taste buds made even the simplest flavors burst with intensity.
